Label.en: Here's a cool picture! Look at the little man standing under the horses!
Label.fr: Voici une photo marrante ! Regarde ce petit homme devant les chevaux !
Label.es: Here's a cool picture! Look at the little man standing under the horses!
Label.zh: Here's a cool picture! Look at the little man standing under the horses!

Label.en: It's from the 'Standard of Ur', want to hear about it?
Label.fr: Elle vient de 'L'Etendard d'Ur', tu veux en savoir plus ?
Label.es: It's from the 'Standard of Ur', want to hear about it?
Label.zh: It's from the 'Standard of Ur', want to hear about it?

Label.en: Great! Now, how does this one start...
Label.fr: Super ! Alors, comment celle-ci commence déjà...
Label.es: Great! Now, how does this one start...
Label.zh: Great! Now, how does this one start...

Label.en: Alright, no problem! Let's try something else...
Label.fr: D'accord, pas de souci ! Essayons autre chose...
Label.es: Alright, no problem! Let's try something else...
Label.zh: Alright, no problem! Let's try something else...
